Articles.Content:
i have a lander on the moon, and suddenly the kerbals were moving very slow and the animation was choppy, and when i tried to lift off in the lander, the fuel was drained at the normal rate but the thrust was 0.0 or 0.1 m/s. what can i do to fix this?

nothing is obstructing the lander engine

also, when a kerbal jumps on eva, they have the floating animation/pose but barely leave the ground
the lander is just the bdb lunar module
